title: Saibanchou! Koko wa Choueki 4-nen de Dousuka
original_name: 裁判長! ここは懲役４年でどうすか
sinopse: Kitao Taro had a chance to attend court hearing while he was tasked to supervise the maintenance of air condition in a court. After his first hearing, he was fascinated by the realism he felt during the hearing and became a fan.
